participant_1.background:
I write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.
i go to the theater to watch plays.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
i used to smoke.
I'm not very close to my parents, but I try to be there for them when I can.

participant_2.background:
I am not very good at keeping up with my family, but I try my best.
i like to work on cars.
i sometimes think i am shallow.
i live on a beet farm.
The most valued material possession I have is my teddy bear from childhood

content.text: Hello there! What's up?
Hi there! I'm doing well, just working on some car repairs.
Cool! I used to work on cars a lot, but I haven't had the time to lately.
What kind of cars do you like to work on?
I like working on all sorts of cars, but I'm especially fond of older muscle cars.
Me too! I have a 1967 Camaro that I'm restoring.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to restore a muscle car.
It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding.
I bet it is. I'm sure your Camaro looks amazing.
Thanks! I'm pretty proud of it.
You should be! It sounds like a great project.
It is. I'm really glad I started it.
I'm glad to hear that. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the theater, watch plays, and read.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all sorts of books, but I'm especially fond of historical fiction and mysteries.
I love historical fiction too! I'm currently reading a book about the American Revolution.
That sounds really interesting! I've always been fascinated by the American Revolution.
It's a fascinating time period. I'm really enjoying the book.
I'm glad to hear that. I might have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great book.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome! It was nice talking to you.
You too
